package abc;

public class Day5CollegeFriends extends Day5Friends{

	String clgName;
	Day5CollegeFriends(String pname,  int a, String d, boolean s,String sname)
	{
		super(pname,a,d,s);
		this.schoolName=sname;
	}
	@Override
	public String toString()
	{
		return "Petname: " + petname + ", Age: " + age + ", DOB: " + dob + ", Status: " + status+" School name: "+schoolName ;
	}
	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		Day5SchoolFriends F=new Day5SchoolFriends("avocado",20,"29/09/2004",true,"BGHS");
		System.out.println(F.toString());
		
	}

}
